name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_83Se
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Se" means the element "selenium" and "83Se" is the isotope "selenium-83" with a half-life of 1.56e-02 days.
